); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return{ orders: state.shopState.orders } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispath) => { var shop_id = localStorage.getItem("shop_id"); return{ getOrdersShop: (shop_id)=>dispath(getOrdersShop(shop_id)) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(OrderManage);
